subsection.name: Description
subsection.p: Runs a set of static code analysis rules on a some Java source code files and generates a list of problems found.

tr.td: The file to which the report is written.
Verbose output - just the name of each file processed Defaults to the current directory.
The set of rules to use (all, general, cougaar)

subsection.name: Examples
subsection.source: <target name="pmd"> <taskdef name="pmd" classname="com.infoether.pmd.PMDTask" /> <pmd reportFile="C:\foo.xml" verbose="false" rulesettype="general" format="xml"> <fileset dir="C:\j2sdk1.4.0\src\"> <include name="**/*.java"/> </fileset> </pmd> </target>
